snippet: Paolo Tiralongo of Italy won the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia on Saturday, finishing a 125-mile leg from Recanati to Rocca di Cambio in 5 hours 51 minutes 3 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Paolo Tiralongo of Italy won the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia on Saturday, finishing a 125-mile leg from Recanati to Rocca di Cambio in 5 hours 51 minutes 3 seconds.
